entry.title: GOVERNOR OPENS APPLICATION PROCESS: JUDICIAL VACANCY IN DOUGLAS COUNTY
entry.summary: August 23, 2025 1:00 p.m. On Friday, Governor Tina Kotek announced that she is accepting applications for a judicial vacancy on the Douglas County Circuit Court. The vacancy was created by the passage of Senate Bill 95, which the Governor signed into law on July 24th. A release said the legislation adds judicial position in...

entry.title: RECORD TIES RECORD HIGH FOR THE DATE ON FRIDAY
entry.summary: August 23, 2025 6:50 a.m. Roseburg tied the record high for the date on Friday. Data from the National Weather Service in Medford said the mercury reached 101 degrees at the Roseburg Regional Airport. That tied the record for August 22nd, which was set in 1934. Roseburg could tie the record high for the date,...

entry.title: Drain Man Sentenced for Firearm Manufacturing Convictions

entry.title: Umpqua, Smith, North Fork Smith Rivers fishery is closed
entry.summary: OREGON — Fishing for Chinook salmon, both hatchery and wild, has closed on the Umpqua, Smith and North Fork Smith rivers because the quota of 500 wild fall Chinook has been reached.
